name: docsy-starter

scripts._check:links--warn: npm run _check:links || (echo; echo 'WARNING: see link-checker output for issues.'; echo)
scripts._commit:public: HASH=$(git rev-parse --short main); cd public && git add -A && git commit -m "Site at $HASH"
scripts._ensure:docsy-hugo-modules: test -d node_modules/github.com || npm --prefix node_modules/docsy run postinstall
scripts._filename-error: echo 'ERROR: the following files violate naming conventions; fix using: `npm run fix:filenames`'; echo; npm run -s _ls-bad-filenames; exit 1
scripts.check:format: npm run _check:format || (echo '[help] Run: npm run fix:format'; exit 1)
scripts.diff:check: npm run _diff:check || (echo; echo 'WARNING: the files above have not been committed'; echo)
scripts.seq: bash -c 'for cmd in "$@"; do npm run $cmd || exit 1; done' -
scripts.test: npm run check:format && npm run check:links

enginesComment: Ensure that engines.node value stays consistent with the project's .nvmrc
gitHubActionCacheKey: 2026-02-06 - refresh cache for Docsy 0.13.0 and Hugo 0.152.2
spelling: cSpell:ignore docsy hugo HTMLTEST netlify precheck postbuild -
